title: Tank Interview, Roscoe Wallace, LBJ $97M, Facebook Sidepiece and more.
itunes:title: Tank Interview, Roscoe Wallace, LBJ $97M, Facebook Sidepiece and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Someone used to play a numbers game back in the day.  No return policy, ex-wife's dogs and daughter's out of control development are what got dealt with by The CLO.  Our family Tank stopped by to share with us his latest and last album R&B Money.  The greatest lounge sanger of all time is back and he tells the truth about Tank and a couple of his new songs.  Uncle Steve helps us imagine Lebron James and his $97 million extension to stay in Los Angeles.  Seagrams got this deal that is so sweet that Carla might try and get it before you just in time for her anniversary.  There seems to be an issue on Facebook and it requires attention STAT!  Would You Rather Friday Edition was extra special.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve leaves us talking about the setback being the setup for the comeback.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
